channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Global stocks decline as U.S. imposes ban on Nvidia exports to China
item.description: The U.S. bond market could come under further pressure, according to a research note published by JPMorgan.

item.title: Why an AI energy crisis may not unfold how you think
item.description: Fears that data centers would devour our power grid were rampant in the early 2000s. The solution wasn’t more power plants.

item.title: Tariffs are coming for America’s favorite beer—but Modelo maker says it’s Trump’s immigration crackdown that’s hurting sales
item.description: Constellation Brands warns that while new tariffs will raise costs, it is President Trump’s immigration crackdown that is already driving down sales.

item.title: Exclusive: Senators Elizabeth Warren and Andy Kim demand investigation into DOGE cuts at CFPB
item.description: Warren, who had conceived of and oversaw the creation of the financial watchdog agency after the financial crisis, is now trying to defend it.

item.title: Trump’s tariffs dash hopes of VC comeback in 2025: ‘It’s going to be an ugly problem’
item.description: Tariff uncertainty is putting even more pressure on the VC market, leaving investors hesitant as tech companies postpone IPOs.

item.title: Who's been selling Treasurys? One bond manager's theories.
U.K. inflation easing pushes Bank of England toward a rate cut
Fund managers say gold, which just hit a new record, is the most crowded trade
ASML shares expected to slump after orders miss
Futures move off lows after report China is willing to enter U.S. trade talks
